nodes.bodyText: Is each LevelInfo immutable? If yes withDefaultGameRules might be better.

It copies the current game rules attached to it though. I honestly didn't check further, but that only seemed to make sense if the LevelInfo was immutable, but the GameRules weren't. (I'll recheck though)
Yes after rechecking: GameRules seem to be mutable, while LevelInfo is not, so "withNewGameRules" might be used if one wants to have the same levelinfo, but with different rules
How about withCopiedGameRules? this sounds like creating a new level info with vanilla's default game rules
